gruppe.irc

Class ServerListItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • gruppe.irc.ServerListItem

  • public class ServerListItem
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that holds information about one line in the servers.ini file.
    Author:
    Anders, Christian and Olaf.
